title: TVAC Boeing 717-200 The Last Legacy V2 - FS2004.zip
description:
The Vans Aircraft Company: The \"Boeing 717-200 The Last Legacy\"
 

This model is a replica from the real one. Each and every detail are reproduced on this model without afecting frames per second and are based on flight and maintenance manuals from the aircraft. 


This model characteristics are: 


AIRCRAFT 

State of the art replica of the aircraft 
Nose section has been redesigned adding the vortilons on 3D 
Wing Root Section has been redesigned giving better shape to this section 
Fuselaje with double bouble style 
Complete 3D Fan Blades 
Wing/ Nacelle lights 
Velocity wheels with steering compressing nose wheel 
Forward Stairs with realistic full motion animation 
Forward Exit/Service redesigned with full interior animation and Lights effects 
Dynamic Shine on fuselage, engines, vertical and horizontal stab 
The horizontal Stabilizer has been redesigned adding a countless number of details 
Animated horizontal Stabilizer (Stabs move up and Down according to trim) 
Perfectly simulated loss of hydraulic pressure on the horizontal stabilizer 
Diferential Ailerons (Hi and Low Speed each one independent) 
one touch Reverses (The Clam Shell reverser now arm fully with just a touch of the reverser \"F2\" ) 
Fully operational animated Landing Lights (Extends with the action of landing lights CTRL+L) 
Highly detailed gear and actuators 
Realistic animation of brakes and roll spoilers 
Detailed every part of the flap, hinges and actuators 
Suspension adjusts height to load 
Highly detailed External power receptacle and Ground crew compartment. 
Improvement of Parking Mode (now adds Catering Trucks, baggage belts truck, Baggage train and fuel truck) 
Highly Detailed and animated Catering Truck 
Highly Detailed and animated baggage belts truck 
Highly Detailed and animated Baggage train 
Highly Detailed and animated fuel truck 
Ground Power unit has been perfectly modelled and it works and comunicate with the 2D Panel 
Animated Flight Deck Door 
Highly detailed and animated Captain window. 
Maintenance Mode has been added (includes Meteo Radar, main and nose landing gear by doors 
Perfect modelled Wheather Radar 
High detailed Pitots, static intakes and stall probe. 
Multi stage flap animation -BOEING Style flight manual with more than 120 pages. 
Taxi, flood lights, Nav, strobe and beacons 
Flight Dynamics tested by real airline pilots and totally realiable on flight manuals and Speed booklets 
Hi Definition Textures 32Bits 

 
VIRTUAL COCKPIT 

All the functions on the virtual cockpit are fully functional and animated, you can perform a complete flight from within the VC. 
Over 80 switches clickable and animated 
Thrust, flap, spoiler animated -Perfectly modelled and animated captain window and it\&#039;s mechanisms 
Rain glass effect 
Display Control System 
Master caution System 
Animated Rudder pedals, Ailerons and Elevator Yokes 
Animated Sterring Wheel with PUSH for parking brakes 
Every switch, handle or Knob modelled in 3D 
Fully operational FMC 
Cabin lightning 
Fully operational autopilot 
Fully operational Displays knobs and switches 
Animated Flight deck doors 
Highly detailed and animated Stairs 
Animated Service and main exits 
Spectacular night lighting 
Flood panel lights FX 
Highly detailed reflecting-transparent windows 
Clickable Sunshine screens


SOUNDS 

Full sound package recorded in engine run test out and inside of the aicraft. 
Multi channel Stereo. 


PANEL 

Redesigned fully operational FMC 
Perfeclty simulated PFD 
Navigation display with ROSE, ARC, MAP and TERRAIN modes. 
Multifunction Display (EICAS, Eicas2, Configuration, Electrical, Fuel, Hydraulic, Stauts and Miscellaneous Display all can be choosen by controls in the pedestal. 
Panel Flood lights. 
Fully operational Pedestal with throttles, MFD control panel, COM1 and COM2, XPNDR, Take off condition, TRIM, Fuel cut-off and Flaps, Spoilers, Fuel x Feed, handles 
Fully operational Overhead Panel 
MODES PANEL (Here can be activated all modes in the aircraft GPU, Ground service Cars, Maintenance Mode, Captain window, Cockpit Door, Main Door, Forward Stairs and cargo Doors) 
MFD Control Panel And extra control panel can be activated on the main panel. 
ZOOM PANEL All the Display can be Zoomed with this comand. 
Two kind of models has been included for those who prefer flying inside of Virtual Cockpit and for those who prefer without VC. 

This package includes all the liveries of the operators of the B717 such as:

AirTran 
Midwest 
Qantas Link 
Impulse 
Bangkok Airways 
Trans World 
Turkmenistan 
Hawaiian Airlines 
AeBal (Aerolineas Baleares) 
Olympic Airways 
JETSTAR 
VUELAMEX 


For more information browse http://www.vansairco.com/ 


This package include:
* Installer.
* Two updates (vc lights / nose down crash).
* Operation manual and Checklist.


Enjoy!!!
